channel.title: Blocking codes how?!
channel.description:
i need to block the following Codes:
White phat red phat Etc jjust all phats
And Torso, neck death cape ( fire cape )
i want those blocked so i mean
Regular people cant spawn it pickup..
Can u guys explain it clear like
where to look , and what i need to search and replace for it. etc etc
Thanks
